alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 25 at 1:24AM MST until January 26 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 AM MST FRIDAY ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 7000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 9 inches. * WHERE...Areas above 7000 feet near Buffalo Pass. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 11 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Snow forecast from 11 AM Today to 11 AM Friday: Buffalo Pass 5 to 9 inches Ganado 0 to 1 inches Window Rock 0 to 1 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
